channel.title: TrisidiaX V4 || New Project || Not Releasing! || Amazing! || 24/7
channel.description:
[img]http://phoenixrsps.com/PSRSbanner.png[/img] TrisidiaX has a brief history upon it, it has a total of 3 releases. V1, V2, V3. its a project i have been doing for about 1-2 years. i have started on RSW as a noob knowing nothing about RSPS Development and i have progressed from there. Now i decided to start up another RSPS but this time not for release. PhoeniX is the name of this one and on this project we are adding in a quite few features to make this feel like an 2006 private sever. We have added a few quest and will continue to add quest if players enjoy them. we will make customs and leech some from runescape 2006 it self. Athough most features on PhoeniX wont work on RSW we have a website created for it and the information is down bellow:
WEBSITE : [url=http://phoenixrsps.com]http://phoenixrsps.com[/url] Forums: [url=http://phoenixrsps.com/community]http://phoenixrsps.com/community[/url]
Features: - Webclient, Download client, forums, home page, donator shop - Crystal key chest gives 3rd age. All monsters drop crystal keys. - Custom mage bank minigame! Play for colored infinity and more magic related prizes. - Player titles - Custom chill zone, donator zone, train zone, and help zone. - dungeoneering and summoning - funpk - Lottery ticket system - Completionist cape reward for 1000 NPC kills - Working EP system and random EP drops - Custom Quests as well as achievments - Great staff - Friendly community - Home Pk - Donator Shop online! ([url=http://phoenixrsps.com/store]http://phoenixrsps.com/store[/url] - In-Game Highscores! - Penguins! (Gets you pk points for amazing items!)
Staff
Owner :Trisidia! [b][font=arial]WE ARE IN NEED OF MODS![/font][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u9d07Ko.png[/img] [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/1070/3rh.png[/img] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/9899/lic6.png[/img]
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/7117/p7f.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MxK6TCg.png[/img]
[img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/3586/qmm.png[/img]
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4610/ie0.png[/img]
[img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/9370/pmr.png[/img]
[img]http://phoenixrsps.com/1.png[/img] [img]http://phoenixrsps.com/2.png[/img] [img]http://phoenixrsps.com/3.png[/img] WORKING QUEST SYSTEM! [img]http://phoenixrsps.com/4.png[/img] ^ HAHA [img]http://phoenixrsps.com/5.png[/img]
[img]http://phoenixrsps.com/6.png[/img]
[font=verdana][size=13px]Ton of pictures to be uploaded soon, as because things are being added constantly and updates are always happening for the good.[/size][/font][font=verdana][size=13px]Hope to see you there! and get items while we have our sales going in our donation shops!!-Trisidia[/size][/font]

item.title: TrisidiaX V4 || New Project || Not Releasing! || Amazing! || 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Trisidia Trisidia
item.description:
@Trisidia wrote:


TrisidiaX has a brief history upon it, it has a total of 3 releases. V1, V2, V3. its a project i have been doing for about 1-2 years. i have started on RSW as a noob knowing nothing about RSPS Development and i have progressed from there. Now i decided to start up another RSPS but this time not for release. PhoeniX is the name of this one and on this project we are adding in a quite few features to make this feel like an 2006 private sever. We have added a few quest and will continue to add quest if players enjoy them. we will make customs and leech some from runescape 2006 it self. Athough most features on PhoeniX wont work on RSW we have a website created for it and the information is down bellow:

WEBSITE : http://phoenixrsps.com
Forums: http://phoenixrsps.com/community

Features:

  • Webclient, Download client, forums, home page, donator shop
  • Crystal key chest gives 3rd age. All monsters drop crystal keys.
  • Custom mage bank minigame! Play for colored infinity and more magic related prizes.
  • Player titles
  • Custom chill zone, donator zone, train zone, and help zone.
  • dungeoneering and summoning
  • funpk
  • Lottery ticket system
  • Completionist cape reward for 1000 NPC kills
  • Working EP system and random EP drops
  • Custom Quests as well as achievments
  • Great staff
  • Friendly community
  • Home Pk
  • Donator Shop online! (http://phoenixrsps.com/store
  • In-Game Highscores!
  • Penguins! (Gets you pk points for amazing items!)

Owner :Trisidia!
